omopColumns.name: nhs_number
omopColumns.query:
select
		distinct
		d.DiagnosisICD,
		apc.GeneratedRecordIdentifier,
		apc.NHSNumber,
		apc.CDSActivityDate
		from omop_staging.sus_ICDDiagnosis d
		inner join omop_staging.sus_APC apc
		on d.MessageId = apc.MessageId
		where apc.NHSNumber is not null

omopColumns.name: condition_source_concept_id
omopColumns.operation_description: Resolve ICD10 codes to OMOP concepts. If code cannot be mapped, map using the parent code.
omopColumns.query:
select
		distinct
		d.DiagnosisICD,
		apc.GeneratedRecordIdentifier,
		apc.NHSNumber,
		apc.CDSActivityDate
		from omop_staging.sus_ICDDiagnosis d
		inner join omop_staging.sus_APC apc
		on d.MessageId = apc.MessageId
		where apc.NHSNumber is not null

omopColumns.name: condition_concept_id
omopColumns.operation_description: Converts ICD10/OPCS4 concepts to SNOMED concepts.

omopColumns.name: condition_start_date
omopColumns.query:

		apc.GeneratedRecordIdentifier,
		apc.NHSNumber,
		apc.CDSActivityDate
		from omop_staging.sus_ICDDiagnosis d
		inner join omop_staging.sus_APC apc
		on d.MessageId = apc.MessageId
		where apc.NHSNumber is not null

omopColumns.name: condition_type_concept_id
omopColumns.operation_description: Constant value set to `32020`. EHR encounter diagnosis
